page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: We sent out a questionnaire to the six farmers in the survey area for them to tell us the amount of all the different kinds of animals, transport, buildings,poultry,machinery,and the amount of acres of all yhe different crops and different kinds of land use. When we got the papers back we worked out an average amount of everything and here are the results: BUILDINGS BUILDING AVERAGE Dryer shed 0 Dutch barn 1 Byre 1 Cattle court 2 Silage pit 0 Hen house 1 Pig sty 1 Barn 1 Sheds for machinery 2 Sheds for potatoes 1 Sheds for bales 2
